name: Complex Rectangular (with exponential)
description: Parses rectangular complex numbers in the following forms:j=i1+2i or 1+2j1.1+2i1+2.2i-1+2i1-2i.1+2i2e+3+2i2E+3+2i2e-3+2i2e3+2i2.2e+3+2ietc...ps.. Doesn't include spaces between numbers as i just remove all spaces from my strings
author: Dennis Eldred
